```
$ cd 工程所在目录 
$ touch .gitignore
$ vim .gitignore
```


> 添中忽略(例子)

```
# Java class files
*.class

# Generated files
bin/
gen/

# Gradle files
.gradle/
build/

# Local configuration file (sdk path, etc)
local.properties

# Proguard folder generated by Eclipse
proguard/

#Android Studio
build/

# Intellij project files
*.iml
*.ipr
*.iws
.idea/

#gradle
.gradle/
```
